returns._0: shouldLiquidate Whether position should be liquidated

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.isLong: True for long, false for short
params.positionId: Position ID (not used in current implementation)

returns._0: shouldLiquidate Whether position should be liquidated

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.isLong: True for long, false for short

calculateLiquidationPrice(bool,uint256,u.notice: Calculate liquidation price for a position

checkLiquidation(bool,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Check if position should be liquidated

decreaseOpenInterest(string,uint256).notice: Decrease open interest when position is closed

getOpenInterest(string).notice: Get current open interest for an asset

increaseOpenInterest(string,uint256).notice: Increase open interest when position is opened

setAssetConfig(string,bool,uint256,uint2.notice: Configure risk parameters for an asset

validateTrade(address,string,uint256,uin.notice: Validate trade before opening position (MarketExecutor interface)
